MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig string ToCallerIDMinMatch(string phoneNumber) cil managed

Docs.summary:
Returns the rightmost MIN_MATCH (5) characters in the network portion in *reversed* order
This can be used to do a database lookup against the column that stores getStrippedReversed()
Returns null if phoneNumber == null
